attributes.action: Provide elderly people with the same kind of legal protection provided for children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There had been a series of cases in which elderly people have been allegedly neglected in nursing homes and  residents being mentally and physically abused, and of falsified records. 
Because the Government has not carried out proposed reforms to give the elderly the same kind of legal protection provided for children, they remain horribly vulnerable

Elderly people rights

Provide elderly people with the same kind of legal protection provided for children
